Class SldSmugglers

java.lang.Object
org.mio.progettoingsoft.advCards.sealed.SldAdvCard
org.mio.progettoingsoft.advCards.sealed.SldSmugglers
public final class SldSmugglers extends SldAdvCard
Represents a "Smugglers" adventure card in the game. This card type involves players encountering smugglers, requiring them to overcome a certain strength value using their ship's fire power. Success leads to rewards (days lost, meaning progress, and potentially goods), while failure results in goods being stolen from the player. It extends SldAdvCard and provides specific logic for smuggler encounters.

  • Constructor Details

    • SldSmugglers

      public SldSmugglers(int id, int level, int stolenGoods, List<GoodType> goods, int strength, int daysLost)
      Constructs a new SldSmugglers adventure card.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for this smuggler card.
      level - The level of the smuggler encounter.
      stolenGoods - The number of goods stolen as a penalty.
      goods - A list of GoodType representing the goods that can be rewarded.
      strength - The combat strength of the smugglers.
      daysLost - The number of days lost as a reward.

    • loadSmugglers

      public static SldSmugglers loadSmugglers(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node)
      Static factory method to load an SldSmugglers object from a JSON node. It parses the node to extract ID, level, strength, days lost, rewards (goods types), and goods lost (stolen goods), then constructs a new SldSmugglers instance.
      Parameters:
      node - The JsonNode containing the Smugglers card data.
      Returns:
      A new SldSmugglers instance populated with data from the JSON node.

    • init

      public void init(GameServer game)
      Initializes the Smugglers card's state and context within the game. Sets up game and fly board references, and initializes the list of allowed players (all players on the fly board) and the player iterator. The flags effectTaken, giverReward, and stealGoods are reset.
      Specified by:
      init in class SldAdvCard
      Parameters:
      game - The GameServer instance managing the current game.

    • applyEffect

      public void applyEffect(Player player, List<Cordinate> drillsCordinate)
      Applies the effect of the Smugglers card based on the player's provided drill power. Players activate drills to increase their fire power and compare it against the smugglers' strength.
      • If power is greater than strength: The player gains a reward (days lost for progress), and the card transitions to GOODS_PLACEMENT state to allow for placing goods. The effectTaken flag is set to true, preventing other players from getting this reward.
      • If power is less than strength: The player has a specified number of goods stolen.
      • If power is equal to strength: No specific effect (neither reward nor penalty) for this player.
      Parameters:
      player - The Player applying the effect.
      drillsCordinate - A list of Cordinate representing the drills activated by the player.
      Throws:
      BadPlayerException - if the provided player is not the current active player.

    • setNextPlayer

      public void setNextPlayer()
      Sets the next player to confront the smugglers or finalizes the card's effect. The card continues processing players one by one until effectTaken is true (meaning a player has successfully overcome the smugglers and claimed the reward), or all players have had their turn.
      Overrides:
      setNextPlayer in class SldAdvCard
